trans-unit.source: Specifies the resource consumed by the member of a class.
This class cannot be inherited.
If the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute> attribute is applied to a member, the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute> attribute must also be applied.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute> 특성이 멤버에 게 적용 되는 <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute> 특성 적용 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the resource scope of the consumed resource is different than the resource scope of how it is consumed, the constructor that takes a `consumptionScope` parameter should be used to specify how the resource is consumed.
trans-unit.target: 리소스 사용 되는 리소스의 범위가 사용 되는 방법의 범위과 다른 경우 생성자를 사용 하는 `consumptionScope` 리소스 사용 하는 방법을 지정 하려면 매개 변수를 사용 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, a resource may be exposed as a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Machine> resource, but only used at the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Process> and <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Assembly> scope.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어으로 리소스를 노출 될 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Machine> 리소스에만 사용 하지만 <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Process> 및 <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Assembly> 범위입니다.

trans-unit.source: For this example the `consumptionScope` parameter is set to <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Process> | <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Assembly>.
The `resourceScope` parameter in the constructor must specify a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> greater than or equal to the resource exposure of all called members.
trans-unit.target: `resourceScope` 생성자에서 매개 변수를 지정 해야 합니다는 <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> 호출된 모든 멤버를 노출 하는 리소스 보다 크거나 같은 경우입니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, a method consuming two <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Process> resources and one <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Machine> resource would be identified as consuming a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Machine> and a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Process> resource by setting `resourceScope` to <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Machine> | <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Process>.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 두 개를 사용 하는 방법 <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Process> 리소스 개와 <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Machine> 리소스를 사용해으로 식별 됩니다는 <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Machine> 및 <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Process> 설정 하 여 리소스 `resourceScope` 를 <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Machine> | <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Process>합니다.

trans-unit.source: `Public` members cannot expose <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Assembly> or <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Private> resources.
trans-unit.target: `Public` 멤버를 노출할 수 없습니다 <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Assembly> 또는 <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Private> 리소스입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Assembly> members cannot expose <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Private> resources.

The graph of methods terminates when a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute> attribute with a resource scope of <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.None> is applied to a method.
trans-unit.target: 하면 그래프가 메서드의 종료는 <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute> 리소스 범위가 사용 하 여 특성 <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.None> 메서드에 적용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute" /> class.
The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope" /> for the consumed resource.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute" /> class specifying the scope of the consumed resource.
The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope" /> for the consumed resource.
The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope" /> used by this member.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute" /> class specifying the scope of the consumed resource and the scope of how it is consumed.

If the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute> attribute specifies a scope of <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.None>, then the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute> attribute must specify a resource it consumes and how it consumes it, by specifying a value for the `consumptionScope` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute> 의 범위를 지정 하는 특성 <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.None>, 하면 <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute> 특성 및 방법을 사용 하는 값을 지정 하 여 리소스를 소비를 지정 해야 합니다는 `consumptionScope` 매개 변수입니다.

trans-unit.source: The scope specified by `consumptionScope` should be less than or equal to the scope specified by `resourceScope`.
trans-unit.target: 지정 하는 범위 `consumptionScope` 지정 하는 범위 보다 작다고 `resourceScope`합니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Process> scope can be consumed as a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Process> or <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.AppDomain> scope, but not as a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Machine> scope.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 한 <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Process> 으로 범위를 사용할 수는 <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Process> 또는 <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.AppDomain> 범위 시 키 지 않고는 <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Machine> 범위입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the consumption scope for this member.
A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope" /> object specifying the resource scope used by this member.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope" /> 이 멤버에서 사용 하는 리소스 범위를 지정 하는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the resource scope for the consumed resource.
A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope" /> object specifying the resource scope of the consumed member.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope" /> 사용 되는 멤버의 범위를 지정 하는 개체입니다.
